Title: Relates to expanding Global NY to establish a global NY reparative economic inclusion program
Summary: Directs the commissioner of economic development to expand Global NY to establish and administer a global NY reparative economic inclusion program to foster international economic partnerships, trade, investment and workforce development opportunities between New York state and nations, regions, communities and organizations representing or comprised of people of African descent.
LawCode: Add ยง226, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to expanding Global NY to promote reparative economic inclusion and diaspora partnerships with nations and peoples of African descent
